lead_paragraph: The Islanders signed defenseman Chris Campoli to a three-year deal yesterday worth $1.9 million. Campoli, 23, has 10 goals and 38 assists in 131 career games.
snippet: The Islanders signed defenseman Chris Campoli to a three-year deal yesterday worth $1.9 million. Campoli, 23, has 10 goals and 38 assists in 131 career games.
